General.Name: Oakworth Capital Inc.
General.Description: Oakworth Capital Inc. operates as a bank holding company for Oakworth Capital Bank that provides range of banking services in the United States. It offers individual retirement, checking, money market, and savings accounts, as well as certificate of deposit; SBA, equipment financing and leasing, owner occupied real estate, investment property, home equity, construction, and margin loans, as well as lines of credit; and treasury management services, including sweep accounts, direct deposit, and zero balance account. The company also provides mobile deposit and wallet, credit and debit cards, online banking and bill payment, positive pay, wire, remote deposit, travel and gift cards, and lock box services. In addition, it offers wealth management and investment, and advisory services. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Birmingham, Alabama.
